entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story, a wizard who lives with his cruel relatives.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and a friend of Harry's family.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is a member of the Order of the Phoenix who helps explain the situation to Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who seeks to kill Harry.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is one of Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives.

entities.name: the order
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is a group of wizards who are fighting against Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry lives with his cruel relatives, the Dursleys.
Mr. Weasley is a friend of Harry's family.
Kingsley helps explain the situation to Harry.
Uncle Vernon is one of Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives.
The Order of the Phoenix fights against Voldemort.
Harry is concerned about Uncle Vernon's safety.
